line.comment: * add custom menu item to array $MainMenu: text='Set homebase...' returnvalue='SetHomebase'
* add custom menu heading to array $MainMenu: title='Accept current settings'
* add custom menu item to array $MainMenu: text=$Text1 returnvalue=10

line.text: 'Enter the name of the ship and choose the colour.'
'Expressions can be used to insert auto-text into names:'

line.comment: * ****Subs:Menu toggles colour based on selection or ship details, ware, size, etc
* $Text1 = [THIS]-> call script 'Lib.MenuHelp.ItemColour.Validate' : Text=$DisplayedShipName InvalidValue=null ValueCurrent=$OriginalShipName InvalidTextReturn='Choose ship name...'

sval.val: Enter the name of the ship and choose the colour.
Expressions can be used to insert auto-text into names:
add custom menu item to array $MainMenu: text='Set homebase...' returnvalue='SetHomebase'
add custom menu heading to array $MainMenu: title='Accept current settings'
add custom menu item to array $MainMenu: text=$Text1 returnvalue=10
****Subs:Menu toggles colour based on selection or ship details, ware, size, etc
$Text1 = [THIS]-> call script 'Lib.MenuHelp.ItemColour.Validate' : Text=$DisplayedShipName InvalidValue=null ValueCurrent=$OriginalShipName InvalidTextReturn='Choose ship name...'
